derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: alteration of obsolete parietary, from Old French paritaire, based on Latin paries, pariet- 'wall'

means.word_mean: 1. herb that grows in crevices having long narrow leaves and small pink apetalous flowers
2. small Mediterranean plant containing a volatile oil once used to relieve toothache
